import React, { Component } from 'react' import Addressbar from './Addressbar' class ParcelSender extends Component { state = { recvData: {}, startTime: 0, endTime: 0, orderWeight: 0, orderType: 0, orderPrice: 0, } async componentDidMount() { let recvParam if (this.props.location && this.props.location.query) { //To see if parameters exist recvParam = this.props.location.query sessionStorage.setItem('recvData', JSON.stringify(recvParam)) // store recvParam in sessionStorage } else { recvParam = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('recvData')) } this.setState({ recvData: recvParam, }) console.log('recvParam', recvParam) } handleChange1 = (e) => { // select startTime this.setState({ startTime: e.target.value }) } handleChange2 = (e) => { // select endTime this.setState({ endTime: e.target.value }) } handleChange3 = (e) => { // select orderWeight this.setState({ orderWeight: e.target.value }) if(e.target.value==1) this.setState({ orderPrice: 3 }) if(e.target.value==2) this.setState({ orderPrice: 5 }) if(e.target.value==3) this.setState({ orderPrice: 7 }) } handleChange4 = (e) => { // select orderType this.setState({ orderType: e.target.value }) } render() { return (
